mapper.select: SELECT e.empID, e.empName, e.empGender, e.empBirthday, e.empPhone, e.empEmail, e.empAddress, e.empStartDate, e.empStatus, t.teamName, p.projectName, (SELECT e2.empName FROM Employee e2 WHERE e2.projectID = e.projectID AND e2.isLeader = 1 LIMIT 1) AS leaderName FROM Employee e LEFT JOIN Team t ON e.teamID = t.teamID LEFT JOIN Project p ON e.projectID = p.projectID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Employee ( empID, empName, empGender, empBirthday, empPhone, empEmail, empAddress, empStartDate, empStatus, createBy, updateBy, createAt, updateAt, teamID, projectID, isLeader ) VALUES ( #{empID}, #{empName}, #{empGender}, #{empBirthday}, #{empPhone}, #{empEmail}, #{empAddress}, #{empStartDate}, #{empStatus}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createAt}, #{updateAt}, #{teamID}, #{projectID}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE Employee SET empName = #{empName}, empGender = #{empGender}, empBirthday = #{empBirthday}, empPhone = #{empPhone}, empEmail = #{empEmail}, empAddress = #{empAddress}, empStartDate = #{empStartDate}, empStatus = #{empStatus}, updateBy = #{updateBy}, updateAt = #{updateAt}, teamID = #{teamID}, projectID = #{projectID}, isLeader = 0 WHERE empID = #{empID}
